# datePickerMode

**Instance Property**

The mode of the date picker.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var datePickerMode: UIDatePicker.Mode { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to change the type of information displayed by the date picker. It determines whether the date picker allows selection of a date, a time, both date and time, or a countdown time. The default mode is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDatePicker/Mode/dateAndTime]. See [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDatePicker/Mode] for a list of mode constants.

## Configuring the date picker mode

- **UIDatePicker.Mode**: The mode displayed by the date picker.
